text:
Hi, I'm new to Hubdb and coding and was hoping that someone may be able to assist in showing me how to include a couple of functions into my website resource module?

I want to be able to filter the table that is pulled into the resource module by one or a combination of two dropdowns that filter by resource-type and or area. Also I would like to be able to search the hubdb table as well. I have included the basic html for the dropdowns and search:
